mapper.select:
SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpLatitude ,a.mpLongitude ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate
ORDER BY a.mpRegDate DESC

SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpLatitude ,a.mpLongitude ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) AS fsNameList FROM mappoint a left join fishandmappoint b on b.mappoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq left join fish c on c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq GROUP BY a.mpSeq ORDER BY a.mpRegDate DESC limit #{rowNumToShow}

SELECT a.mpSeq, a.mpTitle, a.mpText, a.mpAddress, a.mpType, a.mpLatitude, a.mpLongitude, a.mpDelNy, a.mpRegDate, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) FROM fish c LEFT JOIN fishandmappoint b ON c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq WHERE b.mapPoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq ) AS fsNameList FROM mappoint a LEFT JOIN fishandmappoint b ON b.mappoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq LEFT JOIN fish c ON c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq GROUP BY a.mpSeq
HAVING
SUM(CASE WHEN c.fsSeq = #{item} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0
ORDER BY a.mpRegDate DESC

SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) AS fsNameList FROM mappoint a left join fishandmappoint b on b.mapPoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq left join fish c on c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq GROUP BY a.mpSeq ORDER BY a.mpRegDate DESC

SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) AS fsNameList ,ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{baseMpLongitude}, #{baseMpLatitude}), POINT(a.mpLongitude, a.mpLatitude)) AS distanceIn FROM mappoint a left join fishandmappoint b on b.mapPoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq left join fish c on c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq WHERE 1=1 and ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{baseMpLongitude},#{baseMpLatitude}), POINT(a.mpLongitude, a.mpLatitude)) < 100000 AND ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{baseMpLongitude}, #{baseMpLatitude}), POINT(a.mpLongitude, a.mpLatitude)) != 0 GROUP BY a.mpSeq ORDER BY a.mpRegDate DESC

SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) AS fsNameList ,d.season_ssSeq FROM mappoint a left join fishandmappoint b on b.mapPoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq left join fish c on c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq join seasonandfish d on d.fish_fsSeq = c.fsSeq WHERE 1=1 and d.season_ssSeq = #{season_ssSeq} GROUP BY a.mpSeq, d.season_ssSeq ORDER BY a.mpRegDate DESC limit 8
SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate ,a.mpLatitude ,a.mpLongitude FROM mappoint a WHERE 1=1 AND mpSeq = #{mpSeq}

SELECT a.mpSeq ,a.mpTitle ,a.mpText ,a.mpAddress ,a.mpType ,a.mpDelNy ,a.mpRegDate ,a.mpLatitude ,a.mpLongitude ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) AS fsNameList FROM mappoint a left join fishandmappoint b on b.mapPoint_mpSeq = a.mpSeq left join fish c on c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mpSeq = #{mpSeq} GROUP BY a.mpSeq
mapper.update: UPDATE mappoint SET mpDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND mpSeq = #{mpSeq}
